entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 3:51 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.5°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.3°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
